title: Help
body: I would like to know why i got a 14 day ban before this perm ban. Since i was inactive my account for 3 months and longer my account should of resetted to giving me a 25 chat restrictions but instead it gave me a 14 day ban when it should of been a 14 day ban. i would just like to know why.

replies.body:
The "3 months" number was more related to regaining eligibility to Hextech Crafting, and even then, it was related to the average duration for a player to regain eligibility rather than a standard rule. If you received a punishment before you went inactive and received a punishment after you came back, the system can't determine that you actually made progress on reform. This is likely the reason you received a permanent suspension rather than any other punishment. 

If you feel like this ban was given in error, you always have the option to have Riot Player Support to re-examine your suspension:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
